Investor: Has access to strategic documents and proposals for funding.
Project Manager: Oversees active projects; can view execution blueprints.
Broker: Facilitates exchanges and partnerships across AXPT.
Fund Manager: Manages pooled capital; views investor overviews and projections.
Proprietor: Owner-level access to specific enterprise ventures.
Custodial Steward: Guardian of shared assets and responsibilities.
Creative Producer: Has access to content production pipelines and collaborations.
